explains: adj. 获利多的，赚大钱的

sentences.en: They do a lot of business in lucrative overseas markets.
sentences.cn: 他们在利润丰厚的海外市场上生意很多。

sentences.en: Thousands of ex-army officers have found lucrative jobs in private security firms.
sentences.cn: 成千上万的退役军官在私人保安公司找到了薪水丰厚的工作。

sentences.en: The company has doubled its profits since plugging into lucrative overseas markets.
sentences.cn: 自从这家公司步入赚钱的海外市场以后，利润翻了一番。
